statement.p: Vasya's initial salary is 65200. If she receives a raise of 2900 each year, what is the first year her salary is greater (or equal to) 100,000?

solution.p: Her salary must increase more than 100,000-65200 = 34800. This will take \displaystyle\frac{{34800}}{{2900}}={12} years. Because she won't be more than 100,000 until the final, full year that is 12 years.
